author: Ljubešić, Nikola
fulltext: oai:www.clarin.si:11356/1205;2018-12-10T12:48:49Z;hdl_11356_1023;hdl_11356_1024;Word embeddings CLARIN.SI-embed.hr 1.0;Ljubešić, Nikola;word embeddings;lemmatisation;tagging;CLARIN.SI-embed.hr contains word embeddings induced from a large collection of Croatian texts composed of the Croatian web corpus hrWaC and a 400-million-token-heavy collection of newspaper texts. The embeddings are based on the skip-gram model of fastText trained on 1,852,631,924 tokens of running text for (1) 1,742,837 lowercased surface forms (e.g., "hrvatske") and (2) 1,404,515 lowercased lemmas with added part-of-speech information (e.g., "hrvatska#Np").;2018-12-10;lexicalConceptualResource;http://hdl.handle.net/11356/1205;hrv;Creative Commons - Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0);https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/;PUB;application/octet-stream;application/gzip;application/octet-stream;application/gzip;text/plain; charset=utf-8;downloadable_files_count: 4;Jožef Stefan Institute
name: ff27c15d-1005-5b64-8e5e-daa2e87715ce
notes: CLARIN.SI-embed.hr contains word embeddings induced from a large collection of Croatian texts composed of the Croatian web corpus hrWaC and a 400-million-token-heavy collection of newspaper texts. The embeddings are based on the skip-gram model of fastText trained on 1,852,631,924 tokens of running text for (1) 1,742,837 lowercased surface forms (e.g., "hrvatske") and (2) 1,404,515 lowercased lemmas with added part-of-speech information (e.g., "hrvatska#Np").
title: Word embeddings CLARIN.SI-embed.hr 1.0
